PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08952024-07-19PMO
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectActing Ministers Minute
PrecisAppointment of those Cabinet Ministers who may act for the Prime Minister if he is unable to do so, as well as Acting Ministers for all the statutory portfolios.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of those Cabinet Ministers who may act for the Prime Minister if he is unable to do so, as well as Acting Ministers for all the statutory portfolios.
